maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: en_US
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: fr_FR

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Access denied
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Accès refusé

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Hello there, young lady!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Bonjour, jeune dame !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh! My guardian senses are detecting that precious \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0] in your belongings!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oh ! Mes sens de gardiens détecte ce précieux \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0] sur vous !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Don't gimme that look, lady! It's all that I'm detecting!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Me regardez pas comme ça, jeune dame ! C'est tout ce que je peux sentir ! Vous avez ma parole !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Anyway, you're free to enter. Good luck!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: En tout cas, vous êtes libres d'entrer. Bonne chance !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'm sure you're dying to enter this temple here to my back, but I have to ask you to show me the \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0] first.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je suis sûr que vous mourrez d'envie d'entrer dans ce temple derrière moi, mais je dois vous demander de me montrer le \c[3]\v[item.288.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I know it's an annoying formality, but rules are rules!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je sais, c'est une formalité agaçante, mais ce sont les règles !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Just head to \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0]. Really, it should be a breeze for you to acquire that pass over there.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Il suffit que vous alliez au \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0]. Vraiment, cela devrait être facile pour vous d'obtenir ce passe.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Hello there, Seeker.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Ah, bonjour, \v[lore.title.seeker].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: A white Shad came a while back and all the Shad left.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Un Shad blanc est venu il y a longtemps et tous les Shads sont partis.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I assume you have something to do with this?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: J'imagine que vous être un peu responsable de ça ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Thanks a lot. I wouldn't know what to do if this escalated...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Merci beaucoup. Je n'aurais pas su quoi faire si jamais la situation dégénérait...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'll just pretend they are not here...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je vais juste prétendre qu'ils ne sont pas là...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Access denied
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Accès refusé

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Yo, what's up?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Hé, quoi de neuf ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: The path to the north leads up to the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Le chemin vers le nord mène vers le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: You want to enter?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Vous voulez entrer ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: You first need to enter the dungeons to the \c[3]left\c[0] and \c[3]right\c[0] to collect the \c[3]\v[item.231.name]\c[0] and \c[3]\v[item.286.name]\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Vous devez d'abord entrer dans les donjons à \c[3]gauche\c[0] et à \c[3]droite\c[0] pour récupérer le \c[3]Symbole Éclair Violet\c[0] et le \c[3]Symbole Goutte Azur\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: If you've already finished those dungeons... just revisit the \c[3]boss rooms\c[0]. I'm sure you'll find the shades somewhere in there.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Si vous avez déjà terminé ces donjons... alors revenez à leurs \c[3]salles du boss\c[0]. Je suis sûr que vous trouverez les symboles quelque part à l'intérieur.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: It looks like you're ready to enter! Better be prepared then. This is the last dungeon of Gaia's Garden.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: On dirait que vous êtes prêts pour entrer ! Vous feriez mieux d'être préparé alors. C'est le dernier donjon du \v[area.jungle.name].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: P-Please calm down...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: S-S'il vous plait, calmez-vous...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Shad will not stand down! Humans have poisoned great jungle.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Shads ne vont pas s'arrêter ! Humains avoir empoisonné grande jungle !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: No more! We block entrance for all to save jungle!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Ça suffire ! Nous bloquer entrée pour tout le monde, pour sauver jungle !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: This is too much for a single guard...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: C'est trop pour un seul garde...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'm very sorry Seeker, but as you can see we have a situation here.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je suis désolé, \v[lore.title.seeker], mais comme vous le voyez, nous avons un problème là.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: The Shad formed a wall and blocked the path to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] and its trials.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Les Shads ont formé un mur et ont bloqué l'entrée du \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] et de ses épreuves.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: ...Including our power plant.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: ... Y compris notre centrale électrique.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: They let no one through and are clearly agitated.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Ils ne laissent personne passer et sont assez agités.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I fear that as long as they're acting this way, no Seeker can progress any further.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je crains que s'ils ne se calment pas, aucun \v[lore.title.seeker] ne pourra continuer plus loin.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: To be honest, I'm not sure what to do.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Pour être honnête, je ne suis pas sûr de ce que je dois faire.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: What we need here is an official statement from our mayor.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Ce qu'il nous faudrait, c'est une déclaration officielle de notre maire.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I have yet to receive any instructions concerning this whole mess...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Pour l'instant, je n'ai reçu aucune instruction concernant ce bazar...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Seeker, it would be a huge help if you could send word to the mayor.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker], ce serait d'une grande aide si vous pouviez envoyer un message au maire.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Thank you! I will try and hold the fort here.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Merci ! Je vais essayer de garder ma position ici.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: It seems that fate won't let us reach the temples just yet!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: On dirait que le destin fait que nous ne pouvons pas encore atteindre les temples !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Let us quickly seek an audition with the mayor before this conflict escalates any further!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Allons vite demander une audition auprès du maire avant que ce conflit ne dégénère !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: So...\. back to the city again?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Donc...\. on retourne dans la ville ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: And where do we find that mayor?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Et où est ce qu'on trouve ce maire ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Why of course, in the \c[3]Quest Hub\c[0] of \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Où ? Mais dans le \c[3]Carrefour des Quêtes\c[0] du \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0] bien sûr !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Okay. I start seeing the pattern here.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: OK. Je crois que je commence à comprendre la logique.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Visit the \c[3]mayor\c[0] in \c[3]Basin Keep\c[0] to tell him about the Shad blocking the path to the temples.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Trouvez le \c[3]maire\c[0] dans le \c[3]\v[area.jungle-city.name]\c[0] pour l'informer à propos des Shads qui bloquent l'accès au temple.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Is there no way for us to find common ground?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Il n'y a aucun moyen de trouver un accord ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: No! Humans have broken trust with Shad.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Non ! Humains avoir brisé confiance avec Shad.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh bother...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Eh ben...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: What's this?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce que c'est ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Wait...\. something is coming from down there!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Attends...\. quelque chose vient d'en bas !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh, you have got to be kidding!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oh, non, c'est pas possible !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Not the bird people. Again.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Pas encore les hommes oiseaux.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Hi...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Salut...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'm so sorry. I could not stop them.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je suis désolée. Je n'ai pas pu les arrêter.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: ...Why?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: ... Pourquoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: The \c[3]Wiccats\c[0], they're back already! Some of my people have been attacked!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Les \c[3]\v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s\c[0], ils sont revenus ! Quelques personnes de mon peuple ont été attaquées !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Now, they're hell bent on shutting down the power plant for real.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Maintenant, ils sont vraiment déterminés à vouloir fermer la centrale !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Hey, Tara, it's been a while. And you brought a lot of company as well!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Hé, Tara, ça fait un bail. Et vous avez apporté un peu de compagnie !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Dr. Cretia
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Dr. Cretia

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Lou!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Lou !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: We're in trouble!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: On a un problème !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Let me guess, the Cats are back?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Laissez-moi deviner, les Chats sont revenus ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Yes, how'd you know?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui, comment vous savez ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Well, we got them too. Right at the power plant.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Hé bien, les chats sont aussi apparus à la centrale.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: That's terrible!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: C'est terrible !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: No, that's perfect!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Non, c'est parfait !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I've got them right where I want them!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je les ai là ou je voulais qu'ils soient !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: This is the perfect opportunity to research the heck out of these buggers!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: C'est une opportunité idéale pour faire des recherches sur ces bestioles !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: To determine their source - the actual reason for their existence!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Pour déterminer leur source, et la véritable raison de leur existence !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Spoilers: It won't be the power plant.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Spoiler : Ça ne sera pas la centrale électrique.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I wish I had your confidence...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Si seulement je pouvais être aussi confiante que vous...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh, I don't need confidence! I have science!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oh, je n'ai pas besoin de confiance ! J'ai la science à la place !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Anyway, Tara... Please try to keep your folks calm.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: En tout cas, Tara... Essaye de maintenir ton peuple au calme.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I can't have them charge the power plant for the time being.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je ne peux pas me permettre qu'ils envahissent la centrale entre-temps.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'll try my best...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je vais faire de mon mieux...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !
... Salut ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: You have experience in dealing with those Wiccats, correct?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Vous avez de l'expérience pour vous occuper de ces \v[combat.name.minibosses/shockcat-black]s, correct ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Great! Follow me this way, I need your assistance ASAP!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Super ! Suivez-moi par ici, j'ai besoin d'urgence de votre aide !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Yeah, she's the kind that takes your assistance for granted.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui, elle est du genre, à toujours considérer que c'est évident que vous allez l'aider.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Still... this might be our only chance to resolve this conflict peacefully...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Mais bon... c'est peut-être notre seule chance de résoudre le conflit dans le calme...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Let's all work together!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Travaillons tous ensemble !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Looks like we have to solve another little quest before entering the last dungeon.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: On dirait que l'on a besoin de résoudre une autre petite quête avant de pouvoir entrer dans le dernier donjon.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oui, oui. It would have been too easy otherwise, I guess!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui, oui. Ça aurait été trop facile sinon, j'imagine !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Solve the quest \c[3]The Root Cause\c[0] to get access to \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0]!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Terminez la quête \c[3]La Raison du Mal\c[0] pour pouvoir accéder au \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Lou and I have known each other for a long time.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Lou et moi on se connait depuis longtemps.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Without her, I probably wouldn't have found my interest in human society.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Sans elle, je ne me serais sans doute jamais intéressé à la société humaine.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Anyway, if she's that confident I'm sure she has a plan that will help us all.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: En tout cas, si elle est confiante comme ça, c'est qu'elle doit avoir un plan qui va tous nous aider.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: You follow her to the power plant. I'll try and hold off my people for as long as I can.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Suivez-la vers la centrale. Je vais essayer de garder mon peuple ici aussi longtemps que je le peux.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Here we are! That famous dungeon crossing!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Nous y voilà ! Le fameux croisement des donjons !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: So... which dungeon is first?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Donc... lequel donjon est en premier ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I think that is up to us.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je pense que c'est à nous de décider.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: There are two temples we have to complete first in any order.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Il y a deux temples que l'on peut faire dans n'importe quel ordre.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: The \c[3]So'najiz Temple\c[0] in the west...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Le \c[3]\v[area.wave-dng.name]\c[0] à l'ouest...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: ...and the \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] in the east.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: ... et le \c[3]\v[area.shock-dng.name]\c[0] à l'est.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Once we have completed both, we can enter the \c[3]Grand Krys'kajo\c[0] to the north!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Une fois qu'on aura terminé les deux, on pourra entrer dans le \c[3]\v[area.tree-dng.name]\c[0] au nord !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Mon dieu, that's a lot of dungeons.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Mon dieu, ça en fait des donjons.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Well, we don't have to do them all at once.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Bon, on a pas besoin de tous les faire en une fois.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oui, but I'd like to finish at least one of them today.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui, mais j'aimerais bien en terminer au moins un aujourd'hui.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Sounds reasonable.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Ça me semble raisonnable.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh right, what about you, Lea?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Qu'est-ce que tu en dis, Lea ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Are you ready to dive right into dungeon crawling?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Est-ce que tu es prête pour aller parcourir des donjons ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: If you like, we can take a stroll through the jungle first. Punching some more parrots.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Si tu veux, on peut aussi aller faire un détour par la jungle. Pour aplatir quelques perroquets.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Well, yeah...\. we could do that.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui...\. On peut aussi faire ça.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: We leave it up to you, Lea.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: On te laisse choisir, Lea.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: But of course, no entering a dungeon without us!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Mais bien sûr, tu n'entres pas dans un donjon sans nous !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Run the \c[3]So'najiz\c[0] or \c[3]Zir'vitar Temple\c[0] together with \c[3]Emilie\c[0] and \c[3]C'tron\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Courez le \c[3]Temple de So'najiz\c[0] ou de \c[3]Zir'vitar\c[0] avec \c[3]Emilie\c[0] et \c[3]C'tron\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: \c[3]So'najiz End\c[0]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \c[3]Fin de So'najiz\c[0]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Here we are again...
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Nous y revoilà...

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: So...\. should we start another dungeon now?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Donc...\. est-ce qu'il faut qu'on démarre un autre donjon ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Well...\. It is a bit late, isn't it?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: C'est que...\. Il est un peu tard, non ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'm afraid I have to logout soon.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: J'ai bien peur de devoir me déconnecter bientôt.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oui, same for me. I don't think another dungeon fits in.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oui, pareil pour moi. Je pense pas qu'on puisse faire un autre donjon entre-temps.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh, you know what?
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oh, vous savez quoi ?

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Before we log off, we should drop by the headquarters and say hello to Lin and the others.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Avant qu'on parte, on devrait retourner au quartier général et dire bonjour à Lin et aux autres.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Just let them know that Lea is back again and ready for action.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Juste pour leur dire que Lea est de retour.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Oh, that's a good idea!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Oh, bonne idée !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: [nods]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: [acquiesce]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: D'accord! Let's not wait too long, then.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: D'accord ! Commençons à y aller maintenant, alors.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I'm not sure how much longer they'll be online.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je ne suis pas sûr pendant combien de temps ils seront encore en ligne.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Talk to \c[3]Hlin\c[0] in the \c[3]First Scholars HQ\c[0].
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Parlez à \c[3]Hlin\c[0] dans le \c[3]Quartier général des Premiers Érudits\c[0].

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: \c[3]Zir'Vitar End\c[0]
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \c[3]Fin de Zir'Vitar\c[0]

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: K'tara
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: K'tara

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Seeker!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: \v[lore.title.seeker] !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Hi!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Salut !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Lou and I were just talking. Thank you so much for finding the cause of all our problems.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Lou et moi venons de nous parler. Je vous remercie mille fois d'avoir trouvé la cause de tous nos problèmes !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I already talked to my people and for now they at least will let you Seekers to the tree.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: J'ai déjà parlé à mon peuple et pour l'instant, ils vont vous laisser, les \v[lore.title.seeker]s, aller au grand arbre.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: However, it might take a while until they all see the fruits of your labor.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Il va falloir un peu de temps avant qu'ils ne voient et n'apprécient les fruits de votre labeur.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: I will do my best to restore the relationship between humans and Shad.
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Je vais faire de mon mieux pour retisser des liens entre les humains et les Shads.

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Thank you again, Seeker, and may we meet again!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Merci encore, \v[lore.title.seeker] ! Puissions-nous nous retrouver !

maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.orig: Bye!
maps/jungle/dng/dng-crossing.json/entiti.text: Bye !
